text:
I'd like to find `undef` elements in an array - is there a way to do this without a try/catch, as trying to access `undef` elements in an array throws an `UndefRefError`?
```julia> A = Array{String}(undef,2)
2-element Array{String,1}:
 #undef
 #undef

julia> A[1] = "ASDF"
"ASDF"

julia> findall(isempty.(A))
ERROR: UndefRefError: access to undefined reference```
